description: To the wonderful world of Slow Scan Television (SSTV). SSTV is a very fun and exciting mode to send and receive images using your computer, a keying circuit and your ham radio whether it's vhf or hf. Over the years sstv has grown in popularly and the software/hardware used to send and receive pictures with amateur radio has come a long ways as well. MMSSTV has many features not found in other sstv programs and the best part about MMSSTV is that it is free.
author: Makoto Mori (JE3HHT)
